hooks.prompt:
üê∏ Aura Frog v1.0.0 is active - A Claude Code Plugin

**Available Commands:**
- workflow:start <task> - Start 9-phase TDD workflow
- bugfix:quick <description> - Quick bug fix
- project:init - Initialize project context
- agent:list - Show all available agents

**Skills System:** Auto-invoking skills active (agent-detector, workflow-orchestrator, project-context-loader, bugfix-quick, test-writer, code-reviewer, jira-integration, figma-integration)

Type any command or use natural language - Skills will auto-activate based on your intent.

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(rm -rf /|mkfs|dd if=|:(){|fork|shutdown|reboot|halt)'; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è Blocked: Potentially destructive command detected' >&2; exit 2; fi

hooks.comment: Remind to load project context before code generation
hooks.command: if [ ! -f .claude/project-contexts/*/project-config.yaml ]; then echo 'üí° Reminder: Run project:init to create project context before generating code' >&2; fi

hooks.comment: Log command execution for workflow tracking
Detect JIRA ticket IDs and suggest jira-integration skill
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_INPUT" | grep -qE '[A-Z]{2,10}-[0-9]+'; then echo 'üé´ JIRA ticket detected - jira-integration skill may auto-activate' >&2; fi

hooks.comment: Detect Figma URLs and suggest figma-integration skill
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_INPUT" | grep -q 'figma.com/file'; then echo 'üé® Figma link detected - figma-integration skill may auto-activate' >&2; fi

hooks.comment: Suggest workflow handoff if active workflow exists
hooks.command: if [ -f .claude/logs/workflows/active-workflow.json ]; then echo 'üíæ Active workflow detected. Use workflow:handoff to save state for next session.' >&2; fi

hooks.comment: Play context-aware voiceover notification when Claude stops for approval

hooks.command: PLUGIN_DIR="$HOME/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/aurafrog/aura-frog"; if [ -f "$PLUGIN_DIR/scripts/voice-notify.sh" ] && echo "$CLAUDE_NOTIFICATION" | grep -qiE '(error|critical|failed)'; then bash "$PLUGIN_DIR/scripts/voice-notify.sh" 'Alert: Please check the notification' 'error' 2>&1 || true; fi
